Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • Question

  • public class Question
extends java.lang.Object
    Data class for storing questions.
    Version:
    v4.0 June 12th, 2014
    Author:
    Jason P'ng

      • getAnswer

        public java.lang.String getAnswer()

        Returns:
